mapper.select: SELECT grp_cd , sys_type , use_yn , name FROM CMM_GRP_CODE , CMM_CODE_RESOURCE WHERE 1=1 AND TABLE_ID = 'cmm_grp_code' AND REF_ID = grp_cd AND locale = 'ko' AND ${searchTrg} like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')

SELECT cd_sys_id , cd , use_yn , name as cd_name , grp_cd , description FROM CMM_CODE , CMM_CODE_RESOURCE WHERE 1=1 AND TABLE_ID = 'cmm_code' AND REF_ID = cd_sys_id AND locale = 'ko' AND grp_cd = #{grp_cd}

SELECT grp_cd , use_yn , name as grp_cd_nm , description , sys_type FROM CMM_GRP_CODE , CMM_CODE_RESOURCE WHERE 1=1 AND TABLE_ID = 'cmm_grp_code' AND REF_ID = grp_cd AND locale = 'ko' AND grp_cd = #{grp_cd}

SELECT cd_sys_id , cd , use_yn , name as cd_name , grp_cd , description FROM CMM_CODE , CMM_CODE_RESOURCE WHERE 1=1 AND TABLE_ID = 'cmm_code' AND REF_ID = cd_sys_id AND locale = 'ko' AND grp_cd = #{grp_cd} AND cd = #{cd}
